alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 2:46PM CDT until March 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River At Centreville affecting Bibb, Perry and Dallas Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights affecting Bibb, Jefferson and Shelby Counties. .Flooding continues on the Cahaba River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs in the Cahaba Heights area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 15.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
